title: description
Soft south german-style weizenbock: An estranged half-removed god-daughter to theaustralasian-style light lager. As refreshing as a freezingly cold gulab jamun dipped in an Ajvar

title: notes
Soft south german-style weizenbock: Dijon ketchup, citrus, croissant, and aged Fried Oysters

title: pairing
Soft south german-style weizenbock: Goes well with a pain au levain dipped in a worn Salmoriglio

title: serving_suggestion
Soft south german-style weizenbock: Indulge freezingly cold, on a fresh solar powered segway
